author: J Praveen Paul Joseph
text:
Six kg of gold bars and 180 cartons of foreign cigarettes were seized by sleuths attached to Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI), reliable sources told The Hindu here on Tuesday.

In a crackdown , the contraband was seized from a container at the seaport here.

Recently, gold bars weighing 12 kg were seized from a container here. In both cases, the gold bars were concealed in washing powder, which was misdeclared by the importer.

The cigarette cartons did not have any statutory warning and their import was prohibited. The cargo was declared as elastic tape from Port Kelang, Malaysia. The seized cigarette cartons are worth Rs. 1.35 crore. The importer of the contraband was one of the four arrested in the previous case, sources added.
title: 6 kg of gold, 180 foreign cigarette cartons seized
